text: ohu (ibrahim) samaga ævida yana viyata ohu langa vu kalhi, “aho mage putanuvani! niyata vasayenma mama obage gela sinda damannak men sihinayak dutuvemi. eheyin (e gæna) oba adahas karanuye kumakdæyi balanu.” yæyi kiha. “aho mage piyaneni! obata ana karanu labana dæ oba sidu karanu. allahge abhimataya paridi oba ma ivasilivantayin aturin dæka ganu ætæyi” ohu (putu) pævasiya
